programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an actress accuses a high-powered media mogul of attempted rape, Benson finds herself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse; changes in the squad room put Carisi between a rock and a hard place.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a sexual assault investigation is stalled for months, a woman puts her accusations against a popular athlete on a billboard.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular fighter doesn't show up for the biggest bout of the year, Rollins and Velasco are drawn into a complicated web of secrets; McGrath confides in Benson.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: A sneak preview of the newest season of Resident Alien on USA & SYFY.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates allegations against a popular radio personality; Rollins goes under cover when a shocking confession leads to another crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson tries to help a pop star in a volatile relationship; Rollins struggles with taking the stress of work home with her; Fin teaches a rookie a lesson in respecting fellow officers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the case against a popular sports star falls through, Benson digs into the suspect's past to uncover additional victims; Velasco is disappointed when he meets one of his heroes.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Sonya Paxton (Christine Lahti) tries to help an old friend (Debra Messing) who starts receiving personal threats.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After auditioning for a reality show, a woman is found in Central Park unconscious, with drugs in her system and evidence of sexual assault; Detective Benson and Executive ADA Haden (Harry Connick Jr.) continue to grow closer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A promising singer is beaten by her boyfriend, a famous hip-hop star, but she refuses to help ADA Barba build his case; the defendant and his attorney turn the case into a media circus.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As a series of rapes on the Upper West Side puts the city on edge, a celebrity chef (Cybill Shepherd) fears she is the next victim when someone follows her home; Detective Benson has a hard time overcoming her traumatic ordeal.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When a P.D. informant is murdered, the team digs in to track down the perpetrator only to learn a shocking truth; Voight and Ruzek strategize to help Burgess.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Halstead's past resurfaces when a former Army colleague is implicated in a deadly blast; as the FBI launches an investigation into Roy's disappearance, Upton feels the pressure of the secret she and Voight are sharing.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When Upton and Ruzek answer an emergency call to an abandoned house, their investigation leads them down a dark path.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As the team works to solve a deadly shooting in Burnside, Atwater realizes he has a very personal connection to the case.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Ruzek reunites with an old colleague to take down a crime ring, but when things don't add up, Voight and Burgess do some investigating of their own.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As the team works to bring down a drug ring, Voight builds trust with a new informant; however, it soon becomes clear she has a plan of her own.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As the team investigates the stabbing of a father with two young daughters, they begin to suspect there is more to the story than meets the eye; the FBI investigation into Roy Walton's death intensifies while Voight, Upton and Halstead feel the heat.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A mishap on the aerial ladder in the midst of a fire rescue leaves Mouch shaken and questioning his abilities; Kidd looks for support from Severide while Casey and Brett discuss their future.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: While completing a task assigned by headquarters, Boden makes an unforeseen connection; Gallo is forced to make a surprise rescue of one of their own when the firehouse is called to the site of a construction explosion; Mouch reignites an old feud.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: When Firehouse 51 is called to the scene of a dangerous blaze inside a 10-story storage unit, Herrmann and Cruz find themselves trapped inside a freight elevator with all communications cut off.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Gallo makes a split-second decision during a dangerous fire rescue, leaving Casey steaming that his direct orders weren't obeyed; Kidd feels a strain in her relationship with Severide; Brett and Mackey search for answers after some suspicious calls.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A call to a familiar location brings back mixed emotions for Severide; Herrmann heads out for a vacation; Casey is not thrilled with his replacement.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: While Mouch makes an incredible save, all eyes are on a mystery man who helped save his neighbor; Casey worries about his future at the CFD.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A mysterious caller who is in danger relies on Kidd to help save her and her brother; the firehouse helps Cruz get ready for fatherhood.

programme.title: Walking Tall
programme.desc: When Chris Vaughn returns to his hometown to find work, he finds that the lumber mill has closed and the town's big business is now a casino. Aided by his friend Ray Templeton, Vaughn tries to make a stand against the area's crime and corruption.

programme.title: Gridiron Gang
programme.desc: A counselor (The Rock) at a juvenile detention facility turns a group of young criminals into a football team to teach them self-respect and responsibility.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young woman is attacked in her apartment, evidence points to traumatic events from her buried past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 4-year-old student makes claims of sexual abuse against a singing coach and popular TV personality (Billy Porter).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Murphy question a television producer when he is accused of molesting his daughter; Benson strives to discover the truth as accusations fly in the media.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous fashion photographer accused of raping a young model asks his successful brother to help him avoid charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pop star is assaulted in her home, the SVU investigates the public feud between her rapper husband and a competing recording artist; Fin's family ties to a suspect take him off the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A Triad assassin poisons a Homeland Security agent; the discovery of a warehouse of counterfeit purses reveals a money trail to stolen government funds; Nell joins the team in the field.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The murder of a Navy machinist sends the team on a citywide hunt for evidence; Anna Kolcheck (Bar Paly) partners with Callen and Sam in the on-going mole investigation.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A maintenance worker with a dark history puts a local teenager in danger; Sam has to choose which of his colleagues he'll take to the football game.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young woman is attacked in her apartment, evidence points to traumatic events from her buried past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson questions Detective Qadri's involvement in the case of a district attorney who fell to her death.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate when a woman scheduled to testify in a high-profile rape case is murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives are called to investigate when a hotel maid reports being assaulted by a powerful Italian diplomat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a dancer is raped by a man with a unique tattoo, details of the case remind Rollins of a serial rapist she was tracking in Atlanta.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when woman visiting from Buffalo, N.Y., claims her car was stolen with her baby in the backseat.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Rollins investigate when a mental patient says he witnessed a rape, but the alleged victim denies the assault happened.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a child disappears on his way home from school, Benson and Amaro interview the distraught parents, who don't trust the police; with the help of their TARU tech (Gilbert Gottfried) and a meddling reporter, the detectives narrow the suspects list.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives find a missing 14-year-old working as a prostitute, they set up a sting to put the johns away for statutory rape and find one of her customers is a former professional football player.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a rape of an actress during a theater production.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into a home invasion that ended with two dead leads to a shocking revelation about Detective Rollins.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A rape investigation leads to one of Detective Benson's old cases being reopened; as Benson's work is scrutinized, her relationship with Executive ADA David Haden is put in jeopardy.
